summary: Black Hebrew Israelites is a religious group that believes African Americans are descendants of ancient Israelites. They mix ideas from Christianity, Judaism, and other beliefs. Started in the late 19th century, they have many different groups with varying ideas. Some of these groups have been criticized for spreading false history and anti-Jewish ideas. Some are even considered hate groups by organizations like the Southern Poverty Law Center. They are not part of mainstream Judaism or Christianity.
title: Black Hebrew Israelites
